subject: [Radiance-general] Announcement: radzilla0.5 !References: <407AB6B1.7010406@t-online.de> <407AEDEE.1020601@rumblestrip.org>
body:
Message-ID: <407BF528.20108@t-online.de>






This one is fixed now !! Learning English on the fly... thanx for the
corrections!!!


radz can be handled like rad (except the mandatory executable name), so type
radz -x rzpict 'riffilename' with 'riffilename' being a normal RADIANCE
.rif file

Concerning further stuff (rzrvu): It should be rather straightforward to
convert e.g. rvu to deal with
RADZILLA octrees as well, once the general framework is established. So
you can expect more functionality coming soon.

Just a quick note: I'm currently on a one weeks holiday, so this
certainly means some delay on my side for answering questions  etc. But
I'll be back working on the stuff next week...

And concering your house: It depends what kind of artwork you want your
house to be after I'm finished with it ..:-)

-Carsten
